name: Tabby Codespace (no Docker)
onCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y protobuf-compiler libopenblas-dev git
postCreateCommand: git clone --recurse-submodules https://github.com/TabbyML/tabby.git /workspaces/tabby && chmod +x /workspaces/tabby/tabby && /workspaces/tabby/tabby serve --model StarCoder-1B &
